Question.Subject: i want to have a you@yourname email with email forwarding capability. any ideas who can provide it ?
Question.Content: i know it's not free though :D
Question.ChosenAnswer: you have to own the @yourname website. buy it from something like godaddy.com Then once u buy it you have the option to set up email adresses.

Answer.Content:
Not entirely sure on the subject but I think you have to actually own the domain name to have an email to it.
Example. If I wanted the email "jordan@jordan.co.uk" I would have to own the domain name "jordan.co.uk", then I would have to link that up with a web host and configure an email account through them.

youll need to register and purchase a domain name at webs.com for $99.95 a year, you will have 5 custom email addresses.
http://www.webs.com/premium.jsp
you have to own the @yourname website. buy it from something like godaddy.com Then once u buy it you have the option to set up email adresses.
